## (c)

```{r}
library(dslabs)
data(na_example)
print(na_example)
```

```{r}
sum(is.na(na_example))
print(sum(is.na(na_example)))
```

```{r}
no_nas <- ifelse(is.na(na_example), 0, na_example)
print(no_nas <- ifelse(is.na(na_example), 0, na_example))
```

```{r}
sum(is.na(no_nas))
print(sum(is.na(no_nas)))
```
